mapper.select:
select
from merchant
and shop_name like CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%')
and phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and contact_name like CONCAT('%',#{contactName},'%')
and takeaway_phone like CONCAT('%',#{takeawayPhone},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{createTime},'%')
limit #{start},#{limit}

and shop_name like CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%')
and phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
and contact_name like CONCAT('%',#{contactName},'%')
and takeaway_phone like CONCAT('%',#{takeawayPhone},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{createTime},'%')
